comm

Class PCDI_Message

  • java.lang.Object
    • comm.PCDI_Message

  • public class PCDI_Message
extends java.lang.Object
    PCDI_Message

    this class is used for generating a bytewise message which can be sent to the device through the hardware-interface. It converts data to bytewise message, adds header and calculates checksum.

    • Constructor Detail

      • PCDI_Message

        public PCDI_Message(int deviceId,
                    PCDI_MESSAGE_TYPE type,
                    java.util.List<java.lang.Byte> data,
                    byte cs)
             throws CS_Exception
        this is the constructor. it is not used
        Parameters:
        deviceId - the deviceId of the communication-device
        type - the message type
        data - the data (command, value,..)
        cs - the checksum byte to be compared
        Throws:
        CS_Exception - if the checksums dont match
